title: Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument: Places
body: Places                 Quitobaquito Springs   Discover the wonder of Quitobaquito- an oasis in the middle of the scorching desert          Historic Structures   Countless historic structures give us incredible glimpses into how life was in the Sonoran Desert          Peaks and People   Many of the mountains here were given names to honor people and stories from the past.           Â    Discover the unique places that make Organ Pipe Cactus a wonder of the desert southwest. Encompassing over 500 square miles of land, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument is full of special places and resources that tell the amazing stories of nature and culture in the Sonoran Desert.
